submapp.hmm.Hmm.Tr¶

property Hmm.Tr¶

Transition matrix

Store the probability of getting from one hidden class (at instant t-1) to another one (at instant t)

\[Tr[i,j] = p(c^{t}_{hid} = j | c^{t-1}_{hid} = i)\]

with: 0 <= i,j <= n_dis

Return type

np.ndarray[float], shape = (n_dis, n_dis)

See also

  • (Tr,Em,pi)

  • pi

  • Em
